rows.label: qst201502_0010
rows.name:
Here, this way. Hurry
up and follow me...

rows.label: qst201502_0020
rows.name:
...She's awfully excited just
to be doing her job, mo.

rows.label: qst201502_0030
rows.name: It's because everyone's with her, right?

rows.label: qst201502_0040
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: qst201502_0050
rows.name:
Both work and play are no
fun when you're alone.

rows.label: qst201502_0060
rows.name:
Still, you were conducting
surveillance from a place like this?

rows.label: qst201502_0070
rows.name:
That's right... This is
the optimal location.

rows.label: qst201502_0080
rows.name:
There's nothing around here...
What exactly were you watching?

rows.label: qst201502_0090
rows.name: Watch. I'll check on them now...

rows.label: qst201502_0100
rows.name:
The two men I'm surveilling
are over there.

rows.label: qst201502_0110
rows.name:
It seems they're gathering
herbs without getting bored.

rows.label: qst201502_0120
rows.name:
And the other one, a scholar-like man,
seems to be shut up in his room.

rows.label: qst201502_0130
rows.name: You can see that far, mo?

rows.label: qst201502_0140
rows.name: That's amazing, mo.

rows.label: qst201502_0150
rows.name:
Even with Hana's telescopic lens,
we can't see that far, mo.

rows.label: qst201502_0160
rows.name:
So you've been monitoring all three
of them at once with that ability?

rows.label: qst201502_0170
rows.name: Four of them.

rows.label: qst201502_0180
rows.name: Four?

rows.label: qst201502_0190
rows.name:
I was originally monitoring
four suspicious individuals.

rows.label: qst201502_0200
rows.name:
One of them dropped out earlier,
so now there are three left.

rows.label: qst201502_0210
rows.name: What are they doing, exactly?

rows.label: qst201502_0220
rows.name:
...I can't tell the
details just by watching.

rows.label: qst201502_0230
rows.name:
All I know is that they're making something
with the herbs and shipping it abroad.

rows.label: qst201502_0240
rows.name: What could they be planning?

rows.label: qst201502_0250
rows.name: Do you know what kind of herbs they are?

rows.label: qst201502_0260
rows.name:
Sorry, I don't know that
much... I'm not an expert.

rows.label: qst201502_0270
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201502_0280
rows.name: Hey... let's go ask them directly.

rows.label: qst201502_0290
rows.name: Directly... the three of them?

rows.label: qst201502_0300
rows.name: Yes. If we rough them up a bit...

rows.label: qst201502_0310
rows.name:
...we'll find out the identity of
the herbs and their purpose, right?

rows.label: qst201502_0320
rows.name: That's true, but...

rows.label: qst201502_0330
rows.name:
I'm tired of just sitting
here and watching.

rows.label: qst201502_0340
rows.name:
I want to be with my beloved Driver.
Come on, let's go see those three.
